Html:
GUYS CAN U HELP ME....

 

I NEED TO CODE TO REDIRECT A PAGE AFTER SOME TIME.

 

OR SESSION MUST EXPIRE AFTER  2 MINS ,

IF NO USER REQUEST IS THR FROM TAT PAGE..AND PAGE MUST BE REDIRECTED TO

Not really a PHPExcel question

You probably need to set up a js timer and issue an Ajax request at periodic intervals to test whether the session on the server has expired
